fields.name: Notes
fields.value: The Drowner is an enemy appearing in **Gallo Tower**. It attacks the player with magic attack.

fields.name: Spawning
fields.value:
1. The Drowner may be summoned by the 25 minute boss. This version can be killed with a rosary or gorgeous moon and drops a chest.
2. The Drowner spawns on the 30 minute mark 100% of the time. This version cannot be killed.
